sentences: Kell saab hetke pärast 12 – kontrollige ajanäitajaid.
Kontrollige, kas olete kõik vajalikud dokumendid kaasa võtnud.
context: The word 'kontrollige' is the formal plural imperative form of the Estonian verb 'kontrollima', which means 'to check', 'to verify', or 'to inspect'. It's used when addressing multiple people politely. In the given example, it tells someone to check the time indicators after 12 o'clock.
